doc.title: Haversham Hall
doc.plot: Haversham Hall is a televison comedy series currently in production for the Disney Channel. The pilot episodes, slated to air in the Spring of 2006, stars Aly and AJ Michalka (of the DCOM Cow Belles) as sisters Hope Mason & Samantha Teller separated at birth, who reunite at a boarding school called "Haversham Hall" years later. Hope Mason (Alyson Michalka) is a poor, but perky girl who is transferred to New Englands Vernenable who is a new student at Haversham Hall boarding school who becomes roommates with Samantha Teller (Amanda Michalka), a wealthy, troublesome girl from a dysfunctional family. Neither of them know that they're sisters. Which in turns that strange and mysterious things goes on at Haversham Hall.
